How does one download a file when the magnet doesn't seem to work?  I'm connected to 50+ seeders and nothing is downloading.  DHT and Peer Exchange are both enabled and working and I'm using uTorrent.  Any help would be appreciated!
@brega10 which torrent client are you using? if it is utorrent you have to add magnet in to it. and there is instructions on utorrent.com do a little google search and this is not hard at all.

@randallytxt all religions have an ounce of truth but all religions have flaws I believe in self I think these supernatural forces exist but people fear what they don't understand its human nature that's how we survive. but anyway great upload @bigbluesea

@Burt... I'm using uTorrent 3.1.3... and I have magnets added and usually they work with no problem.  I'm just having a problem with this particular torrent's magnet and I can't seem to figure out why.

I was having the same problem with some other book uploaded by BBS, even after being connected to 50+ seeders, I was not able to download the book.But I'd wait for a day or two , keeping it in my client and suddenly it started downloading the book.Since then I don't have any problems at all.
Anyways thanks for an another high quality upload, BBS!
More excellence, thanks. Downloaded in about 6 mins from 3(5) seeds
